full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I TSOGS 'KHOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS CES BSKUL BA'I NGOR LA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI YIG CHA'I DGONGS PA DANG MTHUN PAR ZHABS DRUNG BHIKshU KARMA MANYDZU GHO shR'A ZHES BGYIS PAS GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM NAS 'KHYER BDER BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
